impact_points.description: Development of cycle highways parking garages and improved pedestrian access to reduce car dependency and promote eco-friendly transport
impact_points.reasoning: Central to the program's traffic revolution and climate goals. Directly impacts urban mobility and reduces carbon emissions by encouraging cycling

impact_points.description: Free or subsidized public transport for students and apprentices combined with improved infrastructure to increase usage
impact_points.reasoning: Addresses social equity and climate goals by making sustainable transport affordable and accessible for vulnerable groups

impact_points.description: Renewable energy expansion solar ordinances and district heating conversions to achieve carbon neutrality
impact_points.reasoning: Core to the program's environmental commitments. Directly impacts energy systems and long-term climate resilience

impact_points.description: Redistribution of road space to prioritize pedestrians with improved sidewalks and tram stop accessibility
impact_points.reasoning: Enhances urban livability and safety. Addresses current car-centric infrastructure that disadvantages pedestrians

impact_points.description: Protection of natural areas like Wickede-West and expansion of urban greenery through tree planting and green roofs
impact_points.reasoning: Improves biodiversity and quality of life. Addresses environmental degradation and urban heat island effects

impact_points.description: Increased construction of subsidized housing to address affordability and homelessness
impact_points.reasoning: Tackles Dortmund's housing crisis and poverty issues. Directly impacts social equity and urban development

impact_points.description: Expansion of childcare facilities and educational support for disadvantaged children and youth
impact_points.reasoning: Promotes educational justice and long-term social mobility. Addresses current gaps in childcare and school infrastructure

impact_points.description: Implementation of 30 km/h speed limits and airport noise mitigation strategies
impact_points.reasoning: Improves public health and quality of life. Addresses environmental and social concerns related to noise pollution

impact_points.description: Support for migrants LGBTQ+ communities and anti-discrimination initiatives to foster diversity
impact_points.reasoning: Strengthens social cohesion and equality. Addresses systemic issues in Dortmund's multicultural society

impact_points.description: Implementation of online services and citizen engagement tools to enhance transparency and governance
impact_points.reasoning: Modernizes civic participation and administrative efficiency. Addresses digital divide and accessibility issues
